MenuButton¶

class game.button.MenuButton(top: int, text: str, manager: pygame_gui.ui_manager.UIManager, next_page: str)¶

Class representing a menu button.

Parameters

  • top (int) – top indent

  • text (str) – text

  • manager (pygame_gui.UIManager) – gui manager

  • next_page (str) – page to show after this button is pressed
